Posts.Content: My wife is getting her impants next month.  We have chosen to go with something call cohesive silicon.  The only issue with these implants are is that they are awaiting FDA approval.  That being said, they have the the silicon has consistency of "gummi bears".  We spoke with  a few doctor's on this subject and they all recommended the cohesive.   hope this helps.
Posts.Title: saline or silicone implants after a masectomy

Posts.Content: Our thoughts and prayers are with you.  Please never forget that  although Dawn is not with you physically, she is still with you.  We have added her to our Tribute page, check it out @ talk-cancer.com. We wish you all the best on your journey and will keep you in our prayers.
Posts.Title: another passing of a sisiter
